verses.text: Ha in tik, niwan wal ix aj wab'an syail yuj yowal sk'ol Dios.
Ix in spechb'at t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal b'aj junelnhej k'ik'olinac. Ix in yak' b'ey t'a yoltac b'e b'aj malaj sakil k'inal.
Masanil k'u ichanhej tik in smak'an yet' yowal sk'ool.
Ix yak' ichamax in niwanil, chok'xonhej ix yutejcanb'at in b'aquil.
Ix in smacchej yet' yaelal yet' cusk'olal.
Ix in yak' aj t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, icha yaj heb' chamnacxo.
Ix in smacchej b'aj manhxa b'aj syal weli. Yed' wal k'een niwac cadena ix in stzek'a'.
Wach'chom tz'el wav in k'anan scolwal, max scha yab' tas tzin k'an t'ay.
Ix smac in b'e yet' k'een k'een, yuj chi' axonhej t'a k'ex b'e tzin b'ati.
Lajan ix yutej sb'a Jehová t'ayin icha junok nok' oso sk'ub'ejel sb'a, icha junok nok' choj tz'elta jucnaj t'ayin.
Ix in snherel t'a yol b'e yic chok' tzin yutejcanb'ati, ix in actajcan yuj.
Ix sb'o'och sjul-lab', ix kan ijan t'ayin yet' sjul-lab' chi'.
Ha sjul-lab' ix sjulcot t'ayin, ix k'axpaj t'a yol in k'ool.
Masanil heb' wetanimail sb'uchwaj t'ayin, a inxonhej tzin yal heb' t'a skal slolonel.
D'a wal syaelal ix in ajek' yuj Dios. Te k'a' tas ix yak' wuk'ej.
Ix el wecnaj k'een we ayic ix in em latnaj t'a sat lum yuj, ix in kan telan t'a kal pokok.
Manhxalaj in junk'olal, manhxo naanoc tzalajk'olal wuuj.
Swalani to manhxa in tek'anil, yujto manhxo ayococh Jehová yipoc in k'ool.
Ha tzin naancot in cuselal yet' wek' in ch'ocojil, te ya swab'i.
Ha wal yic tzin naancot juntzanh chi', manhxo animaoc tzin aj swab'i.
Palta ay jun tas tzin nib'ej, aynhejek' t'a in pensar, aton jun chi' in gana swak'nhejoch yipoc in k'ool.
Aton wal yuj swach'k'olal Jehová max onh sateli, yujto tz'ok'nhej sk'ool t'ayonh.
Junjun q'uinhib'alil scheclaj swach'k'olal Jehová, syalnhej cak'anoch t'a ko k'ool.
Yuj chi' swala' to icha in macb'en yaj Jehová, anhej ayoch yipoc in k'ool.
Ha heb' tz'ak'anoch Jehová t'a sk'ool, te wach' Jehová chi' t'a heb', aton heb' to sb'ec wal och sb'ha t'a yol sk'ab'.
Te wach' tato numan tzonh aj ko tanhwani masanto skolwaj Jehová t'ayonh.
Yelxo wach' tato ayic unin animaonhto skak'anoch ko b'ha t'a yalanh smandar Dios.
Wach' tato numan tzonh aj ko ch'ocoj yacb'an syak'och ko yaelal Jehová.
Yowalil tzonh och ejmelal, tzonh em nhojan t'a sat lu'um, talaj tz'ok' sk'ol Jehová t'ayonh.
Wach'chom tzonh mak'ji, tzonh b'uchji, palta ko chaocab'i.
Max onh yaktejcan Jehová t'a junelnhej.
Wach'chom syak'och ko yaelal, palta tz'ok'pax sk'ool t'ayonh, yujto te niwan swach'k'olal.
Val yel malaj snib'ej syak'och ko cusk'olal yet' ko yaelal.
Ha Jehová Dios Axonhej Ochi, malaj snib'ej tz'ixtaj heb' anima t'a preso,
malaj pax snib'ej tz'ik'jiel sderecho heb' ak'b'il yuj.
Manh wach'oc t'a sat Dios tato max ch'olb'itaj heb' anima t'a stojolal.
Max elk'ochlaj tas sco na' tato manhoc Jehová tz'alani.
Max jawilaj wach'ilal ma yaelal, tato manhoc Dios Axonhej Och tz'alani.
¿Tas yuj chuk scab'i tato yuj ko chukal syak' ko yaelal Dios?
Co b'eyk'olejec wal ko b'a sik'lab'il, chajtil yilji ko b'eyb'al, skak'anxioch ko b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' Jehová.
Cak'ecb'at ko pensar d'ha Dios aj satcha’anh, scalan t'a ko lesal icha tik:
Ix och ko mul, ix ko pitej ko b'a t'ayach, maj onh ak' niwank'olal.
Ix jawi yowal a k'ol t'ayonh, ix onh a pechani, ix onh a sateli, majxo ok'laj a k'ool t'ayonh.
Ix a k'ub'ejel a b'a, najat ach b'atcan t'ayonh yic maxtzac ab' ko lesal.
Icha k'alem ix onh utej t'a skal masanil anima.
Masanil heb' cajk'ool, ix onh sb'uchwal heb'.
Tzonh te xiwi yujto a heb' ajk'ol t'ayonh tzonh syam heb', tzonh yixtan heb', tzonh satanel heb', xco chi.
Tz'el wal jiljon yal in sat wok' yuj cusk'olal, yujto wan satel heb' wetchonhab'.
Manh ol wactej wok' yuj wab'annhej syail
masanto ol yak'cot swach'k'olal Jehová t'ayonh t'a satcha’anh.
Te yaxo pax swab' yet' in pixan yuj tas tzek' t'a yib'anh heb' ix ix t'a yol in chonhab'.
Ha heb' ajk'ool, tzin spech heb' wach'chom malaj jab'oc in mul. Icha tz'aj spechji junok nok' much icha chi' tzin yutej heb'.
Pitzan in wal ix in syumanem heb' t'a yol jun jul, ix smacancan sti' jun jul chi' heb' yet' jun k'een k'een, manhxa b'aj syal weli.
Ichato ay in em t'a yol ha ha', ix in naani to yicxo chamel waji.
Mamin Jehová, ato t'a sjulal yich jun jul tik tzin awaj t'ayach.
Ab' yoch in jaj, manh actej ab'an in tewi.
Ix a nitzcot a b'a t'ayin ayic ix ach wavtani, ix alan t'ayin: Manh ach xiwoc, xa chi.
Mamin, ix in a colcanel t'a yol sk'ab' chamel.
Mamin Jehová, ojtac tas tzin utaj t'a manh stojolaloc tik. B'o yaj t'ayin t'a stojolal.
Ojtac tas snib'ej heb' ajk'ol t'ayin yet' tas sna heb' tzin yutej.
Mamin Jehová, ix ab' jantac chukal syal heb' t'a in patic yet' jantac tas sna heb' tzin yutej.
Jun k'u syak' heb' in yalub'tanhani, snaan heb' tas ol in yutoc.
Ilnab' wal, k'ual t'ak'wal in sb'uchan heb'.
Mamin Jehová, ak' spak t'a heb' icha wal smojalil yuj tas tzin yutej.
Ak' pitb'oquel spensar heb', tzak'anb'at catab' t'a yib'anh heb'.
Mamin, pech heb' yet' yowal a k'ool. Satel heb' t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
